module.title: Async JavaScript
module.description: Handle asynchronous operations with Promises and async/await

lessons.title: Promises
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Promises represent future values
- States: pending, fulfilled, rejected
- `.then()` for success, `.catch()` for errors
- `Promise.all()` runs multiple in parallel

---

# Promises

lessons.title: Async / Await
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `async` makes a function return a Promise
- `await` pauses until a Promise resolves
- Use `try/catch` for error handling
- Cleaner than `.then()` chains

---

# Async / Await

lessons.title: The Fetch API
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `fetch()` makes HTTP requests
- Returns a Promise
- `response.json()` parses JSON body
- Can set method, headers, body for POST requests

---

# The Fetch API

lessons.title: Error Handling
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `try/catch` catches synchronous and async errors
- `finally` runs regardless of outcome
- Always handle fetch errors (network + HTTP status)
- Custom error messages help debugging
